item.title: XPN Local - 05.31.2022
item.description: The WXPN Local show from Tuesday, May 31, 2022 featuring a studio session by Air Devi, a West Philly Porchfest preview highlighting Humilitarian, Rockers Galore, and Julia Rainer, and a Roots Picnic Preview with selections from Jazmine Sullivan, Musiq Soulchild and more

item.title: XPN Local - 06.07.2022
item.description: The WXPN Local show from Tuesday, June 7, 2022 featuring a funky guest DJ set from Arthur Thomas of Arthur Thomas and The Funkitorium, a conversation between Rahman Wortman and R&B singer-songwriter Balmour, and a guest DJ set of inspirations by Kingsley Ibeneche and Great Time's Jill Ryan.

item.title: XPN Local - 06.14.2022
item.description: The WXPN Local show from Tuesday, June 14, 2022 featuring the LET'S TALK ABOUT JILL SCOTT roundtable -- a discussion of Jill Scott's music and influence from Black Music CIty grant recipients Ebony Bennett, Sug Daniels, Kerrin Lyons, Eboni Pierce, and Qiaira Riley.

item.title: XPN Local - 06.21.2022
item.description: The WXPN Local show from Tuesday, June 21, 2022 featuring new songs by Alex G, New Enemies, Moustapha Noumbissi, Maggie Pope, and more.

item.title: XPN Local - 06.28.2022
item.description: The WXPN Local show from Tuesday, June 28, 2022 featuring a guest DJ set from Suzanne Sheer, a Key Studio Session from Ellison Jackson, and music by Lizdelise, Vixen77, The Jumping Juvies, Orion Sun and more.

item.title: XPN Local - 07.05.2022
item.description: New music by Meet The Bug, Doll Spirit Vessel, Britt Thomas and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, July 5th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 07.12.2022
item.description: New music by Alexa Gold, Boon, and Moor Mother, a Key Studio Session from Brittany Ann Tranbaugh and her band, a preview of Shady Grove Music Fest and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, July 12th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 07.19.2022
item.description: New music by Ylayali, Katie Bejsiuk, Mochi Robinson, and Suzanne Sheer, a Key Studio Session from Attia Taylor, and a preview of World Cafe Live's Beta Hi-Fi Festiavl on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, July 19th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 07.26.2022
item.description: New music by Sun Ra Arkestra, Alex G, and Palm, studio sessions from The Lunar Year and Kristine Leschper, a preview of Sweet Juice Summer Fest and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, July 26th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.02.2022
item.description: New music by Ruby The Hatchet, Harrowgrove, and Friendship, a Key Studio Session from Mobbluz, previews of Tellus3City Fest and Good Things Are Happening Fest, and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 2nd, 2022.
